entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
